sys_soap_message.name: EzwimESMCases
sys_soap_message.wsdl_xml:
<definitions name = "ESMCase" targetNamespace = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/ESMCase.wsdl" xmlns = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/ESMCase.wsdl" xmlns:xsd = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<message name = "ESMCaseRequest"> <part name = "object" type = "xsd:string"/>
<part name = "reseller" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "company" type = "xsd:string"/>
<part name = "sysid" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "caller" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "priority" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "number" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "severity" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "state" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sys_updated_on" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "hold_reason" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "resolved_by" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sys_updated_by" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "active" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "sys_domain_path" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "work_notes_list" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<message name = "ESMCaseResponse"> <part name = "status" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "id" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<portType name = "ESMCase_PortType"> <operation name = "createCase"> <input message = "tns:ESMCaseRequest"/> <output message = "tns:ESMCaseResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name = "ESMCase_Binding" type = "tns:ESMCase_PortType"> <soap:binding style = "rpc" transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name = "createCase"> <soap:operation soapAction = "createCase"/> <input> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:esmcaseservice" use = "encoded"/> </input>
<output> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:esmcaseservice" use = "encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name = "ESMCase"> <documentation>WSDL File for ESMCases</documentation> <port binding = "tns:ESMCase_Binding" name = "ESMCase_Port"> <soap:address location = "http://integration.ezwim.com/sendCase/" /> </port> </service> </definitions>
